author: jedwards@businessinsider.com (Jim Edwards), Jim Edwards
title: There is hope: All the reasons to be optimistic about the end of the coronavirus crisis
description: Guglielmo Mangiapane/Reuters The coronavirus crisis is coming to an end in China. Even Italy appears to have stunted the momentum of the disease. Here are all the reasons to be optimistic. Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories. With the UK going …
content:
Business Insider
With the UK going into a total self-imposed quarantine, several large American cities in lockdown, and distressing scenes coming out of Spain and Italy, life right now feels chaotic and insecure. It's a crisis. The economy has ground to a ha… [+4025 chars]
